item.title: Cooking grains and cereals
item.description: Rolled oats 2 cups of water for every cup of oats. Combine the oats and water in a pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce to medium heat, let cook for 15 minutes. Steel-cut oats 3 1/2 to 4 cups water for every cup of oats. Combine the oats and water in a pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce to medium heat, let cook for 20 minutes while stirring from time to time.
